For crawls pushing 2 million discovered URLs I have needed a heap of
800MB, and that has pushed things.

This actually raises a question: what would the recommendation be for
a dedicated crawling box? My thinking was along the lines of:

- Dual CPU 32-bit 686
- At least 3 GB physical memory
- Minimally three 160 GB drives
- Linux Kernel 2.4.x, tuned distro (e.g., Gentoo)
- DVD-RW

This would be designed to run two Heritrix instances as well as
off-line processing tools.
